subject: Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony was suspended for his actions after the Knicks’ loss to the Celtics on Monday, when he went toward the locker room and later waited for Kevin Garnett outside Boston’s team bus.
snippet: Carmelo Anthony was suspended for his actions after the Knicks’ loss to the Celtics on Monday, when he went toward the locker room and later waited for Kevin Garnett outside Boston’s team bus.
